group_1.textLeft: On another note, how long do we have to dress@like this?

group_1.narration: [flashEffect:flashWhite1][se:3201_heal]"[textRed:We'll be dressing like this]@[textRed:as long as we're preparing!]"

group_1.textLeft: So, what's next after cleaning up the pumpkins?

group_1.textRight: I need you to take charge of decorating the@schoolyard!
Earlier, one of the other committee members said@that Alina-senpai
had said to "leave things to chance, challenging the@context of art."
I don't really understand it, so...
I'd like to leave the decorating to Alina-senpai!

group_1.textLeft: (Alina is so fed up with this...)
(Alina can't stand it. The only choice is to make@a run for it.)
Because Alina has other business that only Alina@can take care of right now.

group_1.textRight: Business only Alina-senpai can take care of?
But this is also one of those things!
I can only trust Alina-senpai to do the decorating!

group_1.textLeft: These decorations don't need to be done right@now, do they?
Just keep an eye on things here for a while.
You're in the executive committee, after all.
(Well, Alina's going to escape while you're busy@with that and never come back, though.)

group_1.textRight: Other than decorating, something only Alina-senpai@can take care of...
... Ah! I see!@I get what you mean now!
I'll leave it to you, Alina-senpai!

group_1.narration: [flashEffect:flashWhite1][se:3201_heal]"[textRed:Make sure you get rid of them!]"

group_1.textLeft: (Well, if she's letting me escape, it's fine.)
(She agreed so quickly, I can't help but get a bad@feeling about this...)

group_1.textCenter: I can't believe she went to fight Witches on her@own initiative, to keep the Halloween Festa safe...
Alina-senpai finally got her act together!@I'm glad!
I'll do my best to get everything ready, too!
